moTa: The Acura ILX is available as a sedan. The 2018 ILX starts at $28,100 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $965. It gets EPA-estimated 29 MPG combined. The Acura ILX competes against models like the BMW 320, Lincoln MKZ, and Subaru Legacy. The ILX is a good fit for luxury shoppers Luxury vehicles include all models from dedicated luxury brands plus luxurious models selected by our editors. .

The Acura NSX competes against models like the Aston Martin Vanquish, Maserati GranTurismo, and Mercedes-Benz AMG GT. The NSX is a good fit for luxury shoppers Luxury vehicles include all models from dedicated luxury brands plus luxurious models selected by our editors. .
